sqlReaderQuery.value:
Select 
  pl1.DATAAREAID as DATAAREAID, 
  pl1.INVENTTRANSID, 
  pl1.PURCHID, 
  pl1.LINENUMBER, 
  pl1.QTYORDERED as QTYINVENTORYUNIT, 
  pl1.ITEMID, 
  itm1.UNITID as INVENTTABLEMODULE_UNITID, 
  pl1.PURCHQTY, 
  pl1.PURCHUNIT, 
  pl1.PRICEUNIT, 
  pl1.PURCHPRICE, 
  pl1.LINEAMOUNT, 
  pt1.ACCOUNTINGDATE, 
  pt1.CONFIRMEDDLVEARLIEST as EARLIEST_CONFIRMED_DATE, 
  pl1.INVENTDIMID as INVENTORY_DIMENSION_ID, 
  id2.TIMEZONE, 
  tzi1.TIMEBIAS, 
  pl1.CREATEDDATETIME as PURCHLINE_CREATEDDATETIME, 
  pt1.CREATEDDATETIME as PURCHTABLE_CREATEDDATETIME, 
  pt1.DELIVERYDATE as PURCHTABLE_DELIVERYDATE, 
  pt1.DXCSHIPBYDATE as PURCHTABLE_DXCSHIPBYDATE, 
  pt1.DLVMODE as DELIVERY_MODE_ID, 
  pt1.RETURNREASONCODEID as PURCHTABLE_RETURNREASONCODEID, 
  pt1.WORKERPURCHPLACER as PURCHTABLE_WORKERPURCHPLACER, 
  pt1.REQUESTER as PURCHTABLE_REQUESTER, 
  pt1.INVOICEACCOUNT as PURCHTABLE_INVOICEACCOUNT, 
  pt1.ORDERACCOUNT as PURCHTABLE_ORDERACCOUNT, 
  pt1.INVENTLOCATIONID as PURCHTABLE_INVENTLOCATIONID, 
  pl1.DELIVERYDATE as PURCHLINE_DELIVERYDATE, 
  pl1.DXCSHIPBYDATE as PURCHLINE_DXCSHIPBYDATE, 
  pl1.CURRENCYCODE, 
  pl1.DEFAULTDIMENSION, 
  itm1.MODIFIEDDATETIME as INVENTTABLEMODULE_MODIFIEDDATETIME, 
  pl1.ASSETTRANSTYPEPURCH as PURCHLINE_ASSETTRANSTYPEPURCH, 
  pl1.DELIVERYTYPE as PURCHLINE_DELIVERYTYPE, 
  pl1.STOCKEDPRODUCT as PURCHLINE_STOCKEDPRODUCT, 
  pl1.PURCHSTATUS as PURCHLINE_PURCHSTATUS, 
  pl1.PURCHASETYPE as PURCHLINE_PURCHASETYPE, 
  pl1.MCRDROPSHIPMENT, 
  pl1.DELIVERYPOSTALADDRESS, 
  pl1.MODIFIEDDATETIME as PURCHLINE_MODIFIEDDATETIME, 
  tet1.ENUMVALUELABEL as TIMEXTENDERENUMTABLE1_ENUMVALUELABEL_ASSET_TRANSACTION_TYPE, 
  tet2.ENUMVALUELABEL as TIMEXTENDERENUMTABLE2_ENUMVALUELABEL_DELIVERY_TYPE, 
  tet3.ENUMVALUELABEL as TIMEXTENDERENUMTABLE3_ENUMVALUELABEL_DOCUMENT_STATUS, 
  tet4.ENUMVALUELABEL as TIMEXTENDERENUMTABLE4_ENUMVALUELABEL_PURCH_LINE_STATUS, 
  tet5.ENUMVALUELABEL as TIMEXTENDERENUMTABLE5_ENUMVALUELABEL_PURCH_HEADER_STATUS, 
  tet6.ENUMVALUELABEL as TIMEXTENDERENUMTABLE6_ENUMVALUELABEL_PURCHASE_TYPE, 
  tet7.ENUMVALUELABEL as TIMEXTENDERENUMTABLE7_ENUMVALUELABEL_DROP_SHIPMENT, 
  vit1.INVOICEDATE, 
  vit1.INVENTDATE, 
  pl1.TRANSACTIONCODE, 
  pl1.PROCUREMENTCATEGORY, 
  pl1.TAXITEMGROUP, 
  (
    SELECT 
      MAX(LastUpdateDate) 
    FROM 
      (
        VALUES 
          (pt1.MODIFIEDDATETIME), 
          (
            isnull (
              itm1.MODIFIEDDATETIME, '1950-01-01'
            )
          ), 
          (
            isnull (
              pl1.MODIFIEDDATETIME, '1950-01-01'
            )
          ), 
          (
            isnull (
              vit1.MODIFIEDDATETIME, '1950-01-01'
            )
          ), 
          (
            isnull (
              id2.INVENTDIM_MODIFIEDDATETIME, 
              '1950-01-01'
            )
          )
      ) AS UpdateDate (LastUpdateDate)
  ) AS LATEST_MODIFIEDDATETIME 
from 
  dbo.PURCHLINE pl1 
  left join dbo.PURCHTABLE pt1 on pl1.DATAAREAID = pt1.DATAAREAID 
  and pl1.PURCHID = pt1.PURCHID 
  left join dbo.INVENTTABLEMODULE itm1 on itm1.MODULETYPE = 0 
  and pl1.DATAAREAID = itm1.DATAAREAID 
  and pl1.ITEMID = itm1.ITEMID 
  left join (
    select 
      ENUMNAME, 
      ENUMVALUE, 
      max(ENUMVALUELABEL) as ENUMVALUELABEL 
    from 
      dbo.TIMEXTENDERENUMTABLE 
    where 
      ENUMNAME = 'AssetTransTypePurch' 
    group by 
      ENUMNAME, 
      ENUMVALUE
  ) tet1 on pl1.ASSETTRANSTYPEPURCH = tet1.ENUMVALUE 
  left join (
    select 
      ENUMNAME, 
      ENUMVALUE, 
      max(ENUMVALUELABEL) as ENUMVALUELABEL 
    from 
      dbo.TIMEXTENDERENUMTABLE 
    where 
      ENUMNAME = 'TradeLineDlvType' 
    group by 
      ENUMNAME, 
      ENUMVALUE
  ) tet2 on pl1.DELIVERYTYPE = tet2.ENUMVALUE 
  left join (
    select 
      ENUMNAME, 
      ENUMVALUE, 
      max(ENUMVALUELABEL) as ENUMVALUELABEL 
    from 
      dbo.TIMEXTENDERENUMTABLE 
    where 
      ENUMNAME = 'DocumentStatus' 
    group by 
      ENUMNAME, 
      ENUMVALUE
  ) tet3 on pt1.DOCUMENTSTATUS = tet3.ENUMVALUE 
  left join (
    select 
      ENUMNAME, 
      ENUMVALUE, 
      max(ENUMVALUELABEL) as ENUMVALUELABEL 
    from 
      dbo.TIMEXTENDERENUMTABLE 
    where 
      ENUMNAME = 'PurchStatus' 
    group by 
      ENUMNAME, 
      ENUMVALUE
  ) tet4 on pl1.PURCHSTATUS = tet4.ENUMVALUE 
  left join (
    select 
      ENUMNAME, 
      ENUMVALUE, 
      max(ENUMVALUELABEL) as ENUMVALUELABEL 
    from 
      dbo.TIMEXTENDERENUMTABLE 
    where 
      ENUMNAME = 'PurchStatus' 
    group by 
      ENUMNAME, 
      ENUMVALUE
  ) tet5 on pt1.PURCHSTATUS = tet5.ENUMVALUE 
  left join (
    select 
      ENUMNAME, 
      ENUMVALUE, 
      max(ENUMVALUELABEL) as ENUMVALUELABEL 
    from 
      dbo.TIMEXTENDERENUMTABLE 
    where 
      ENUMNAME = 'PurchaseType' 
    group by 
      ENUMNAME, 
      ENUMVALUE
  ) tet6 on pl1.PURCHASETYPE = tet6.ENUMVALUE 
  left join (
    select 
      ENUMNAME, 
      ENUMVALUE, 
      max(ENUMVALUELABEL) as ENUMVALUELABEL 
    from 
      dbo.TIMEXTENDERENUMTABLE 
    where 
      ENUMNAME = 'NoYes' 
    group by 
      ENUMNAME, 
      ENUMVALUE
  ) tet7 on pl1.MCRDROPSHIPMENT = tet7.ENUMVALUE 
  left join (
    select 
      id20.DATAAREAID, 
      id20.INVENTDIMID, 
      max(is20.TIMEZONE) over (
        partition by id20.DATAAREAID, id20.INVENTDIMID
      ) as TIMEZONE, 
      max(id20.MODIFIEDDATETIME) over (
        partition by id20.DATAAREAID, id20.INVENTDIMID
      ) as INVENTDIM_MODIFIEDDATETIME, 
      max(is20.MODIFIEDDATETIME) over (
        partition by id20.DATAAREAID, id20.INVENTDIMID
      ) as INVENTSITE_MODIFIEDDATETIME 
    from 
      dbo.INVENTDIM id20 
      left join dbo.INVENTSITE is20 on id20.DATAAREAID = is20.DATAAREAID 
      and id20.INVENTSITEID = is20.SITEID
  ) id2 on pl1.DATAAREAID = id2.DATAAREAID 
  and pl1.INVENTDIMID = id2.INVENTDIMID 
  left join dbo.DATAAREA da1 on pl1.DATAAREAID = da1.ID 
  left join dbo.TIMEZONEINFO tzi1 on pl1.CREATEDDATETIME >= tzi1.STARTDATE 
  and pl1.CREATEDDATETIME < tzi1.ENDDATE 
  and isnull(id2.TIMEZONE, da1.TIMEZONE) = tzi1.TIMEZONEID 
  left join dbo.DATAAREA da3 on pl1.DATAAREAID = da3.ID 
  left join dbo.TIMEZONEINFO tzi3 on pl1.CREATEDDATETIME >= tzi3.STARTDATE 
  and pl1.CREATEDDATETIME < tzi3.ENDDATE 
  and da3.TIMEZONE = tzi3.TIMEZONEID 
  left join (
    select 
      DATAAREAID, 
      INVENTTRANSID, 
      max(invoicedate) invoicedate, 
      max(INVENTDATE) INVENTDATE, 
      max(MODIFIEDDATETIME) MODIFIEDDATETIME 
    from 
      dbo.VENDINVOICETRANS 
    group by 
      DATAAREAID, 
      INVENTTRANSID
  ) vit1 on pl1.DATAAREAID = vit1.DATAAREAID 
  and pl1.INVENTTRANSID = vit1.INVENTTRANSID 
where 
  (
    SELECT 
      MAX(LastUpdateDate) 
    FROM 
      (
        VALUES 
          (pt1.MODIFIEDDATETIME), 
          (
            isnull (
              itm1.MODIFIEDDATETIME, '1950-01-01'
            )
          ), 
          (
            isnull (
              pl1.MODIFIEDDATETIME, '1950-01-01'
            )
          ), 
          (
            isnull (
              vit1.MODIFIEDDATETIME, '1950-01-01'
            )
          ), 
          (
            isnull (
              id2.INVENTDIM_MODIFIEDDATETIME, 
              '1950-01-01'
            )
          )
      ) AS UpdateDate (LastUpdateDate)
  ) > '@{variables('v_prv_max_upd_timestamp')}'

select
    pl1.dataareaid AS DATAAREAID,
    pl1.inventtransid AS INVENTTRANSID,
    pl1.purchid AS PURCHID,
    pl1.linenumber AS LINENUMBER,
    pl1.qtyordered AS QTYINVENTORYUNIT,
    pl1.itemid AS ITEMID,
    itm1.unitid AS INVENTTABLEMODULE_UNITID,
    pl1.purchqty AS PURCHQTY,
    pl1.purchunit AS PURCHUNIT,
    pl1.priceunit AS PRICEUNIT,
    pl1.purchprice AS PURCHPRICE,
    pl1.lineamount  AS LINEAMOUNT,
    pt1.accountingdate AS ACCOUNTINGDATE,
    pt1.confirmeddlvearliest AS EARLIEST_CONFIRMED_DATE,
    pl1.inventdimid AS INVENTORY_DIMENSION_ID,
    id2.timezone AS TIMEZONE,
    tzi1.timebias AS TIMEBIAS,
    pl1.createddatetime AS PURCHLINE_CREATEDDATETIME,
    pt1.createddatetime AS PURCHTABLE_CREATEDDATETIME,
    pt1.deliverydate AS PURCHTABLE_DELIVERYDATE,
    pt1.dxcshipbydate AS PURCHTABLE_DXCSHIPBYDATE,
    pt1.dlvmode AS DELIVERY_MODE_ID,
    pt1.returnreasoncodeid AS PURCHTABLE_RETURNREASONCODEID,
    pt1.workerpurchplacer AS PURCHTABLE_WORKERPURCHPLACER,
    pt1.requester AS PURCHTABLE_REQUESTER,
    pt1.invoiceaccount AS PURCHTABLE_INVOICEACCOUNT,
    pt1.orderaccount AS PURCHTABLE_ORDERACCOUNT,
    pt1.inventlocationid AS PURCHTABLE_INVENTLOCATIONID,
    pl1.deliverydate AS PURCHLINE_DELIVERYDATE,
    pl1.dxcshipbydate AS PURCHLINE_DXCSHIPBYDATE,
    pl1.currencycode AS CURRENCYCODE,
    pl1.defaultdimension AS DEFAULTDIMENSION,
    itm1.modifieddatetime AS INVENTTABLEMODULE_MODIFIEDDATETIME,
    pl1.assettranstypepurch AS PURCHLINE_ASSETTRANSTYPEPURCH,
    pl1.deliverytype AS PURCHLINE_DELIVERYTYPE,
    pl1.stockedproduct AS PURCHLINE_STOCKEDPRODUCT,
    pl1.purchstatus AS PURCHLINE_PURCHSTATUS,
    pl1.purchasetype AS PURCHLINE_PURCHASETYPE,
    pl1.mcrdropshipment AS MCRDROPSHIPMENT,
    pl1.deliverypostaladdress AS DELIVERYPOSTALADDRESS,
    pl1.modifieddatetime AS PURCHLINE_MODIFIEDDATETIME,
    tet1.enumvaluelabel AS TIMEXTENDERENUMTABLE1_ENUMVALUELABEL_ASSET_TRANSACTION_TYPE,
    tet2.enumvaluelabel AS TIMEXTENDERENUMTABLE2_ENUMVALUELABEL_DELIVERY_TYPE,
    tet3.enumvaluelabel AS TIMEXTENDERENUMTABLE3_ENUMVALUELABEL_DOCUMENT_STATUS,
    tet4.enumvaluelabel AS TIMEXTENDERENUMTABLE4_ENUMVALUELABEL_PURCH_LINE_STATUS,
    tet5.enumvaluelabel AS TIMEXTENDERENUMTABLE5_ENUMVALUELABEL_PURCH_HEADER_STATUS,
    tet6.enumvaluelabel AS TIMEXTENDERENUMTABLE6_ENUMVALUELABEL_PURCHASE_TYPE,
    tet7.enumvaluelabel AS TIMEXTENDERENUMTABLE7_ENUMVALUELABEL_DROP_SHIPMENT,
    vit1.invoicedate AS INVOICEDATE,
    vit1.inventdate AS INVENTDATE,
    (
        select
            max(lastupdatedate)
        from
            (
                values
                    (pt1.modifieddatetime),
                    (isnull (itm1.modifieddatetime, '1950-01-01')),
                    (isnull (pl1.modifieddatetime, '1950-01-01')),
	         (isnull (vit1. modifieddatetime, '1950-01-01')),
	         (isnull (id2.inventdim_modifieddatetime, '1950-01-01'))
            ) as updatedate (lastupdatedate)
    ) as LATEST_MODIFIEDDATETIME
from 
	 dataverse_nalatst_cds2_workspace_unqe092999b0ee2ee1190466045bda8c.dbo.purchline pl1
left join dataverse_nalatst_cds2_workspace_unqe092999b0ee2ee1190466045bda8c.dbo.purchtable pt1 on
	pl1.dataareaid = pt1.dataareaid and
	pl1.purchid = pt1.purchid
left join dataverse_nalatst_cds2_workspace_unqe092999b0ee2ee1190466045bda8c.dbo.inventtablemodule itm1 on
	itm1.moduletype = 0 and
	pl1.dataareaid = itm1.dataareaid and
	pl1.itemid = itm1.itemid
left join (select enumname, enumvalue
			, max(enumvaluelabel) as enumvaluelabel
		from dataverse_nalatst_cds2_workspace_unqe092999b0ee2ee1190466045bda8c.dbo.timextenderenumtable
		where enumname = 'AssetTransTypePurch'
		group by enumname, enumvalue) tet1 on
	pl1.assettranstypepurch = tet1.enumvalue
left join (select enumname, enumvalue
			, max(enumvaluelabel) as enumvaluelabel
		from dataverse_nalatst_cds2_workspace_unqe092999b0ee2ee1190466045bda8c.dbo.timextenderenumtable
		where enumname = 'TradeLineDlvType'
		group by enumname, enumvalue) tet2 on
	pl1.deliverytype = tet2.enumvalue
left join (select enumname, enumvalue
			, max(enumvaluelabel) as enumvaluelabel
		from dataverse_nalatst_cds2_workspace_unqe092999b0ee2ee1190466045bda8c.dbo.timextenderenumtable
		where enumname = 'DocumentStatus'
		group by enumname, enumvalue) tet3 on
	pt1.documentstatus = tet3.enumvalue
left join (select enumname, enumvalue
			, max(enumvaluelabel) as enumvaluelabel
		from dataverse_nalatst_cds2_workspace_unqe092999b0ee2ee1190466045bda8c.dbo.timextenderenumtable
		where enumname = 'PurchStatus'
		group by enumname, enumvalue) tet4 on
	pl1.purchstatus = tet4.enumvalue
left join (select enumname, enumvalue
			, max(enumvaluelabel) as enumvaluelabel
		from dataverse_nalatst_cds2_workspace_unqe092999b0ee2ee1190466045bda8c.dbo.timextenderenumtable
		where enumname = 'PurchStatus'
		group by enumname, enumvalue) tet5 on
	pt1.purchstatus = tet5.enumvalue
left join (select enumname, enumvalue
			, max(enumvaluelabel) as enumvaluelabel
		from dataverse_nalatst_cds2_workspace_unqe092999b0ee2ee1190466045bda8c.dbo.timextenderenumtable
		where enumname = 'PurchaseType'
		group by enumname, enumvalue) tet6 on
	pl1.purchasetype = tet6.enumvalue
left join (select enumname, enumvalue
			, max(enumvaluelabel) as enumvaluelabel
		from dataverse_nalatst_cds2_workspace_unqe092999b0ee2ee1190466045bda8c.dbo.timextenderenumtable
		where enumname = 'NoYes'
		group by enumname, enumvalue) tet7 on
	pl1.mcrdropshipment = tet7.enumvalue				
	left join (select id20.dataareaid, id20.inventdimid
			, max(is20.timezone) over (partition by id20.dataareaid, id20.inventdimid) as timezone
			, max(id20.modifieddatetime) over (partition by id20.dataareaid, id20.inventdimid) as inventdim_modifieddatetime
			, max(is20.modifieddatetime) over (partition by id20.dataareaid, id20.inventdimid) as inventsite_modifieddatetime
		from dataverse_nalatst_cds2_workspace_unqe092999b0ee2ee1190466045bda8c.dbo.inventdim id20
		left join dataverse_nalatst_cds2_workspace_unqe092999b0ee2ee1190466045bda8c.dbo.inventsite is20 on
			id20.dataareaid = is20.dataareaid and
			id20.inventsiteid = is20.siteid) id2 on
	pl1.dataareaid = id2.dataareaid and
	pl1.inventdimid = id2.inventdimid
LEFT join dataverse_nalatst_cds2_workspace_unqe092999b0ee2ee1190466045bda8c.dbo.dataarea da1 on
	pl1.dataareaid = da1.fno_id
left join dataverse_nalatst_cds2_workspace_unqe092999b0ee2ee1190466045bda8c.dbo.timezoneinfo tzi1 on
	pl1.createddatetime >= tzi1.startdate and
	pl1.createddatetime < tzi1.enddate and
	isnull(id2.timezone, da1.timezone) = tzi1.timezoneid
left join dataverse_nalatst_cds2_workspace_unqe092999b0ee2ee1190466045bda8c.dbo.dataarea da3 on
	pl1.dataareaid = da3.fno_id
left join dataverse_nalatst_cds2_workspace_unqe092999b0ee2ee1190466045bda8c.dbo.timezoneinfo tzi3 on
	pl1.createddatetime >= tzi3.startdate and
	pl1.createddatetime < tzi3.enddate and
	da3.timezone = tzi3.timezoneid      
left join (select   dataareaid, inventtransid, max(invoicedate) invoicedate , max(inventdate) inventdate, max(modifieddatetime) modifieddatetime  
from dataverse_nalatst_cds2_workspace_unqe092999b0ee2ee1190466045bda8c.dbo.vendinvoicetrans
group by dataareaid, inventtransid) vit1 on
	pl1.dataareaid = vit1.dataareaid and
	pl1.inventtransid = vit1.inventtransid
where
    (
        select
            max(lastupdatedate)
        from
            (
                values
                    (pt1.modifieddatetime),
                    (isnull (itm1.modifieddatetime, '1950-01-01')),
                    (isnull (pl1.modifieddatetime, '1950-01-01')),
	         (isnull (vit1. modifieddatetime, '1950-01-01')),
	         (isnull (id2.inventdim_modifieddatetime, '1950-01-01'))
            ) as updatedate (lastupdatedate)
    ) > '@{variables('v_prv_max_upd_timestamp')}';
